entry.title: Corona's Settaigal
entry.content:
Today we went out to visit some tourist spots situated in Guindy,But actually we visited amazing tourist spot named D Mart and Sangeetha’s Desi Mane and then we visited Gandhi Mandabam.

We had a good food @Sangeetha’s Desi Mane.And then I had one Falooda costs 2.75$.

Today we spent Rs.2000 wastely,Because of Birla Planitorium.

So please confirm anything before you proceed.

Don’t believe Justdial . They don’t give the exact information.

Ham agale blog par milenge

entry.title: Today We Are Going to Birla Planitorium
entry.content:
We are going to Birla Planitorium,It is situated in Kotturpuram,Near Guindy

We planned go by OLA cab due to COVID

I tell you my experience at Birla Planitorium

OK BYE

entry.title: Nivar Experience
entry.content:
When Nivar was announced,I was in Chennai enjoying my Covid Days with my cousin sisters

At that time all over Chennai was affected by Nivar Cyclone but our area was secured and less affected Infact even we went to Thalapakatti near Selaiyur to feast our Stomach

Though we had few interuptions with wi-fi connections and power outages,we never stopped having fun

We changed our home as Theatre and Watched SooraraiPottru in OTT
